title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 179.1 - Qualifying experience
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 179.1 - Qualifying experience

State Regulations

An applicant for licensure as a real estate broker must
possess two years of full-time experience as a licensed real estate salesperson
under the supervision of a licensed real estate broker or the equivalent
full-time experience in general real estate business for a period of at least
three years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
179.1

Amended

New

York State Register May 20, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 20, eff. 5/20/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
